sentences.english: Spread cloud, QinQu fingertip condensate, water are off the hubbub.
sentences.chinese: 廣袖流雲，琴曲指尖凝，清水芙蕖脫塵囂。

sentences.english: The day , with the noise of this little earth , drowns the silence of all worlds.
sentences.chinese: 白晝用這卑微人世的塵囂，蓋過了宇宙諸天的寂靜。

sentences.english: This is why Tahiti is the ideal place to get away from it all.
sentences.chinese: 這就是爲什麼大溪地是個能讓人遠離塵囂的理想國度。
